languages.text: {n}Мастер Печатей удивленно смотрит поверх окуляров.{/n} "Что вы. Согласно приказу ДА-58, пункт 201, жителям мира-столицы протектората фон Валанциус надлежит обращаться в одно из назначенных окон сего зала ожидания. И Вольному Торговцу, и любому другому просителю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер Печатей удивленно смотрит поверх окуляров.{/n} "Что вы. Согласно приказу ДА-58, пункт 201, жителям мира-столицы протектората фон Валанциус надлежит обращаться в одно из назначенных окон сего зала ожидания. И Вольному Торговцу, и любому другому просителю".

languages.text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер Печатей удивленно смотрит поверх окуляров.{/n} "Что вы. Согласно приказу ДА-58, пункт 201, жителям мира-столицы протектората фон Валанциус надлежит обращаться в одно из назначенных окон сего зала ожидания. И Вольному Торговцу, и любому другому просителю".

In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

{n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

{n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

{n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

languages.text: {n}印章大师透过目镜看着你。{/n}“恐怕不是。根据DA-58号法令第201条规定，冯·瓦兰修斯王国首都世界的公民必须在等候大厅指定的窗口递交请愿书。法令中并没有规定行商浪人有权不遵守这条法令。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章大师透过目镜看着你。{/n}“恐怕不是。根据DA-58号法令第201条规定，冯·瓦兰修斯王国首都世界的公民必须在等候大厅指定的窗口递交请愿书。法令中并没有规定行商浪人有权不遵守这条法令。”

languages.text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos te mira por encima de sus lentes.{/n} «En absoluto. Según el decreto DA-58, cláusula 201, los ciudadanos del mundo capital del protectorado von Valancius deben enviar sus peticiones a las ventanillas asignadas de la sala de espera. El decreto no estipula excepción alguna para Comerciantes Independientes».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos te mira por encima de sus lentes.{/n} «En absoluto. Según el decreto DA-58, cláusula 201, los ciudadanos del mundo capital del protectorado von Valancius deben enviar sus peticiones a las ventanillas asignadas de la sala de espera. El decreto no estipula excepción alguna para Comerciantes Independientes».

languages.text: {n}印章長は眼鏡越しにこちらをじっと見つめる。{/n}「いえ、決して。DA-58令201条によりますと、フォン・ヴァランシウス護民官の首都惑星の市民は、待合室の設定時間に嘆願を提出しなくてはなりません。条項には自由開拓者の除外規定がないため、従っていただきます」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章長は眼鏡越しにこちらをじっと見つめる。{/n}「いえ、決して。DA-58令201条によりますと、フォン・ヴァランシウス護民官の首都惑星の市民は、待合室の設定時間に嘆願を提出しなくてはなりません。条項には自由開拓者の除外規定がないため、従っていただきます」

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse des sceaux vous observe par-dessus ses lorgnons mécaniques.{/n} « Non, c'est très sérieux, au contraire. En vertu du décret DA-58, alinéa 201, les citoyens du monde-capitale du protectorat von Valancius doivent faire enregistrer leurs démarches auprès d'un des guichets aménagés à cet effet dans la salle d'attente. Je précise que le texte de loi ne fait aucune mention d'une dérogation applicable {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse des sceaux vous observe par-dessus ses lorgnons mécaniques.{/n} « Non, c'est très sérieux, au contraire. En vertu du décret DA-58, alinéa 201, les citoyens du monde capitale du protectorat von Valancius doivent faire enregistrer leurs démarches auprès d'un des guichets aménagés à cet effet dans la salle d'attente. Je précise que le texte de loi ne fait aucune mention d'une dérogation applicable {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel fixiert dich über ihre Linsen hinweg.{/n} "Wohl kaum. Gemäß Erlass DA-58, Absatz 201, müssen Bürger der Hauptwelt des Protektorats von Valancius ihre Anträge bei einem der zugewiesenen Schalter in der Wartehalle einreichen. Der Erlass sagt nicht, dass Freihändler von dieser Regel ausgenommen sind."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel fixiert dich über ihre Linsen hinweg.{/n} "Wohl kaum. Gemäß Erlass DA-58, Absatz 201, müssen Bürger der Hauptwelt des Protektorats von Valancius ihre Anträge bei einem der zugewiesenen Schalter in der Wartehalle einreichen. Der Erlass sagt nicht, dass Freihändler von dieser Regel ausgenommen sind."

languages.text: {n}Mühür Üstadı, sana oküler merceklerinin üstünden gözlerini kısarak bakıyor.{/n} "Öyle bir şey olur mu hiç? DA-58 Sayılı Kararnamenin 201 Sayılı Bendi uyarınca von Valancius protektorasının başdünyasının tüm yurttaşları, dilekçelerini bekleme salonunun bu iş için tahsis edilmiş bankolarından birinde ibraz etmelidir. Kararnamede, Hür Tacir'in bu kuraldan muaf tutulacağı belirtilmemiş."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers at you over her ocular lenses.{/n} "Hardly. In accordance with Decree DA-58, Clause 201, citizens of the capital world of the von Valancius protectorate must submit their petitions at one of the assigned windows of the waiting hall. The decree makes no mention of the Rogue Trader being exempt from this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mühür Üstadı, sana oküler merceklerinin üstünden gözlerini kısarak bakıyor.{/n} "Öyle bir şey olur mu hiç? DA-58 Numaralı Kararnamenin 201 Numaralı Bendi uyarınca von Valancius protektorasının başdünyasının tüm yurttaşları, dilekçelerini bekleme salonunun bu iş için tahsis edilmiş bankolarından birinde ibraz etmelidir. Kararnamede, Hür Tacir'in bu kuraldan muaf tutulacağı belirtilmemiş."
